mdRecord.dcterms:description: The New Reading Room addition by Hartman-Cox (1980s). Haskell Center located across the street from the main library, opened in 2000; Andrew Stevenson remodelled a 19th century office building. The Elizabethan Garden opened in 1989 contains sculpture by Greg Wyatt. [work]
